biotools.summary: Adopts model selection and model averaging to calculate nonsynonymous (Ka) and synonymous (Ks) substitution rates, attempting to include as many features as needed for accurately capturing evolutionary information in protein-coding sequences. In addition, several existing methods for calculating Ka and Ks are also incorporated into KaKs_Calculator.

bioschemas.name: Kaks_Calculator
